name: Titanium.UI.iPad.DocumentViewer
summary: A DocumentViewer provides in-app support for managing user interactions with files on the local system.

methods.name: setUrl
methods.summary: Sets the url of the document viewer.

methods.name: show
methods.summary: Displays the document viewer over the current view.

parameters.name: animated
parameters.summary: Indicates whether the show transition should be animated.

parameters.name: view
parameters.summary: The view property would specify the view relative to where the viewer should display.
